title: Lopaka
description: Lopaka and his adopted father don’t get along. That is, until forces from beyond the veil intervene.
itunes:title: Lopaka
itunes:subtitle: Lopaka and his adopted father don’t get along. That is, until forces from beyond the veil intervene.  We travel to Hawaii to bring you this very special Spooked tale. Thank you, Lopaka Kapanui for sharing your story with us. Want more stories from Lopaka
author: stats@snapjudgment.org (Snap Judgment)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and WNYC Studios
itunes:summary: Lopaka and his adopted father don’t get along. That is, until forces from beyond the veil intervene.
